text: Herbert William "Herb" Bergson (September 16, 1956 - February 10, 2022) was an American Minnesota Democratic–Farmer–Labor Party politician. He was the Mayor of Duluth, Minnesota from 2004 until 2008. He also was the Mayor of Superior, Wisconsin from 1987 until 1995. Bergson was the only person to have served as mayor in both cities.
